#BlackMagicCraft #Episode091

In this episode I discuss 5 simple ways DM's can set the mood for a game of D&D. These simple items are easy to implement and will encourage good role playing in your tabletop rpg.

If you want to use my Spotify playlists support on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/posts/19082735
